languages.text: "Страсть связала сердца Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус и Джай Хейдари!"
"Passion has bound the hearts of Rogue Trader von Valancius and Jae Heydari!"
languages.original_text: "Страсть связала сердца Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус и Джай Хейдари!"

traits.locale_text: "Passion has bound the hearts of Rogue Trader von Valancius and Jae Heydari!"
"Passion has bound the hearts of Rogue Trader von Valancius and Jae Heydari!"
"Passion has bound the hearts of Rogue Trader von Valancius and Jae Heydari!"
"Passion has bound the hearts of Rogue Trader von Valancius and Jae Heydari!"

languages.text: “行商浪人冯·瓦兰修斯与婕伊·海达利，两人的心被激情紧紧相连！”
languages.original_text: "Passion has bound the hearts of Rogue Trader von Valancius and Jae Heydari!"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人冯·瓦兰修斯与婕伊·海达利，两人的心被激情紧紧相连！”

languages.text: 「情熱が自由開拓者であるフォン・ヴァランシウスとジェイ・ヘイダリの心を結びつけてるんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Passion has bound the hearts of Rogue Trader von Valancius and Jae Heydari!"

traits.locale_text: 「情熱が自由開拓者であるフォン・ヴァランシウスとジェイ・ヘイダリの心を結びつけてるんだ！」

languages.text: «¡La pasión brota entre {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius y Jae Heydari!».
languages.original_text: "Passion has bound the hearts of Rogue Trader von Valancius and Jae Heydari!"

traits.locale_text: «¡La pasión brota entre {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius y Jae Heydari!».

languages.text: « La passion a lié le cœur {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} à celui de Jae Heydari ! »
languages.original_text: "Passion has bound the hearts of Rogue Trader von Valancius and Jae Heydari!"

traits.locale_text: « La passion a lié le cœur {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} à celui de Jae Heydari ! »

languages.text: "Die Leidenschaft hat die Herzen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius und von Jae Heydari miteinander verwoben!"
languages.original_text: "Passion has bound the hearts of Rogue Trader von Valancius and Jae Heydari!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Leidenschaft hat die Herzen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius und von Jae Heydari miteinander verwoben!"

languages.text: "Hür Tacir von Valancius'un ve Jae Heydari'nin kalpleri birbirine tutkuyla bağlı!"
languages.original_text: "Passion has bound the hearts of Rogue Trader von Valancius and Jae Heydari!"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir von Valancius'un ve Jae Heydari'nin kalpleri birbirine tutkuyla bağlı!"
